Key evidence: - Title: "CERTIFICADO DE COMPOSICIÓN ACCIONARIA" (Certificate of Shareholder Composition) - Confirms a single shareholder with complete ownership - Legally sworn statement about company ownership - Provides detailed identification of the sole shareholder 4. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** The document is self-certified by the company's legal representative, Henry Antonio Alterio González, who owns 100% of ECOSIMPLE SAS. 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** The document appears to be an internally generated ownership certificate with legal standing, indicating a self-declared shareholder composition record. Definitively matches ACC category criteria through clear ownership documentation showing full corporate participation by a single individual.
